story.title: The Three Little Pigs
story.body: Once upon a time there was an old mother pig who had three little pigs and not enough food to feed them. So when they were old enough, she sent them out into the world to seek their fortunes.

story.title: Winnie The Pooh
story.body: Story about a bear that plays in the woods with his friends.

story.title: Jack and The Beanstalk
story.body: A boy named Jack buys a magic bean.

story.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
story.body: A race between a hare and a turtoise takes an unexpected turn.
